entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 2:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
